main event: A witness observed a white light in the sky in Dayton, Ohio in 1963.
interesting points: The object appeared to stand still at times, suddenly speed up, and change direction.
The object was brighter than the brightest stars.
The witness was not sure if the object gave off smoke or trail.
The object was observed through eyeglasses, sunglasses, and window glass.
The witness described the object as a white light, and drew a sketch showing its shape and motion.
sighted object: a bright white light in the sky
